children.text:
�The purpose of "Real Time CPR Guide" application is to help a person to perform CPR when needed at the correct way.

As a CPR course guide, lots of students told me that "in time of stress I would never be able to remember what to do and I will probably prefer not to perform CPR".
"Real Time CPR Guide" comes to resolve this fear, because the application displays the CPR's flow in easy and intuitive way.
In time of needed, the application will guide you with the correct flow steps and will explain you how to perform each step. 

On the other hand, there is no more frustrating feeling to see a person needing help and you cannot help him or afraid to help him. with "Real Time CPR Guide" this is not going to happen.

Furthermore, if there is another person with you he can help you and explain you what to do according to what "Real Time CPR Guide" describe to do.

Today, researches show that while performing CPR even if the steps are incorrect and even not done at a perfect way, it increases the chances to save a person life.

"Real Time CPR Guide" is updated according to the new CPR flow  
"C,A,B".
Which saying, first help his cardio situation and only than help him with Air way.

NOTE: you are using "Real Time CPR Guide" on your own risk and "Real Time CPR Guide" cannot promise that if a person needs CPR treatment, you will save him even if you performed CPR exactly like the "Real Time CPR Guide" described
